== Description ==

Generates a random number

== Parameters ==

{{Parameter|$min|integer|Lower limit for the generated number (optional, default is 0)|optional|0}}

{{Parameter|$max|integer|Upper limit for the generated number (optional, default is 4294967295)|optional|0}}

== Return Values ==

{{Return||integer|A random number between min and max}}

Since: [[Version 2.6.2|2.6.2]]
